actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to require the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation to treat certain deposits of the Freedom National Bank of New York as insured deposits.

summary.text: Requires the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation to treat as insured deposits those deposits at the Freedom National Bank of New York on the date it was closed that were deposits of a charitable organization.

titles.title: A bill to require the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation to treat certain deposits of the Freedom National Bank of New York as insured deposits.
